title: American horror story freakshow - dandy's death
author: ONCEUPON a HORRORSTORY
comment: One of the most iconic speeches in all of AHS. "...That's where you think freaks belong. Powerless. Behind glass. A human car crash to stare at and remind you how lucky YOU are. Well maybe that's true. Maybe that's all we are, but let me tell you this. Pretty boy, you may look like a motion picture dream boat, but you are the biggest freak of them ALL." -Desiree Dupree, played by Angela Bassett. The theme is a twisted version of "Beauty is on the inside" but so is the ugly.
"I'm a song and dance man!" Lol even right up until the end he was so childishly naive

I honestly am fine with people's head cannons where Dandy is a sympathetic character, but it's pretty clear that the point of his character is that true evil can exist where a person has every benefit: money, good looks, lots of people looking out for him, etc.  He's the foil in the show: the freaks have nothing, but struggle to be good.  He has everything, but finds a way to be evil.
"I HATE YOU!, I HATE YOU!, I HATE YOU!!!!" - Dandy Mott's most iconic line from the entire season
"THEY WERE GOOD PEOPLE!" "I'm good people too!" Sure...
description:
American horror story freakshow - Bet Dot, Jimmy and Desiree kill dandy 
4x13 curtain call
